fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Bug bounty competition progressing; no critical issues affecting timeline
Testnet schedule: Holesky Oct 1, Sepolia Oct 15, Hoodi Oct 29
BPOs activate one week after each testnet's Fusaka activation
60M gas limit default in mainnet Fusaka releases

client_updates.highlight: Geth, Lighthouse, Nimbus, Prism releases expected by Monday
Holesky shadow fork scheduled for tomorrow with available releases

testing_progress.highlight: BAL devnet-0 targeting October; no EIP changes, self-destruct handling clarified
EPBS Beta 0 released; devnet-0 target early November
Multiple EL clients (Besu, Geth, Nethermind) started BAL implementations

organizational.highlight: All Fusaka EIPs moving to last call as testnets activate
Glamsterdam PFI deadline: when mainnet Fusaka releases ship (~1 month)
No CFI→SFI promotions until BAL/EPBS running on multi-client devnet
EIP champion role proposal: primary contact per fork, tested on forkcast
Tim OOO rest of year; Ansgar hosting next ACDE

action_items.action: Review and approve PRs moving Fusaka EIPs to last call
Use latest CL spec (v1.6.0-beta.0) for BAL and EPBS devnets
Source champion names for existing PFI EIPs if proposal approved

decisions.decision: Default 60M gas limit included in mainnet Fusaka releases
Test EIP champion role on forkcast before formalizing in specs
